articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 25th anniversary stream: Watch Square Enix’s event here
articles.description: Square Enix’s Final Fantasy 7 25th Anniversary Celebration event streams live on June 16, and will likely offer updates on Final Fantasy 7 Remake and possibly a peek at Part 2 and a rumored Crisis Core remake.
articles.content: Square Enix will talk all things FF7

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Marvel’s next Disney Plus show is Wonder Man
articles.description: The Hollywood Reporter said on June 16, 2022 that Destin Daniel Cretton, director of Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, is executive producer of a Wonder Man TV show for Disney Plus.
articles.content: The next Marvel super hero headed to Disney Plus for a live-action series is Wonder Man, a character who dates back to the earliest days of the Avengers, gaining prominence in the 1980s as a founding… [+1403 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Redfall campaign progression is locked to host, not multiplayer teammates
articles.description: Arkane Studios Austin’s Harvey Smith clarified how players would progress in Redfall’s campaign, since the 2023 game features drop-in cooperative multiplayer.
articles.content: For those wondering how Redfallwould handle progression in a campaign that features cooperative multiplayer, Arkane Studios Austin has clarified that only the sessions host will actually advance thro… [+1294 chars]

articles.author: Tasha Robinson
articles.title: Marcel the Shell With Shoes On ticket giveaway: See the film early and for free
articles.description: The viral YouTube videos from Jenny Slate and Dean Fleischer-Camp have become a feature-length movie from A24. Polygon readers in 15 major cities can RSVP for free tickets to advance screenings.
articles.content: Fans of the kind of auteur-driven horror that helped make A24s name as a powerhouse distribution boutique most recently, the likes of Midsommar, Hereditary, X, and Men may have been a little nonpluss… [+1691 chars]

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Abbott Elementary season 2 debuts in September
articles.description: ABC announced that the second season of Abbott Elementary will premiere on Wednesday, September 21.  The first season of Quinta Brunson-led sitcom mockumentary about the staff of a underfunded Philadelphia elementary school ranks as one of best TV shows of 20…
articles.content: Abbott Elementary, one of the best shows of the year so far, is returning this September. According to The Hollywood Reporter, ABC announced Thursday that the second season of Quinta Brunsons critica… [+777 chars]

articles.author: Matt Leone
articles.title: Xbox indie game demos will bring Summer Game Fest home
articles.description: Get a taste of Batora: Lost Haven, Severed Steel, Broken Pieces, Tinykin, and others during the now-annual Xbox indie game demo week running alongside Summer Game Fest.
articles.content: For the third year in a row, Microsoft is putting together a week of Xbox indie game demos tied to the news and announcements of Summer Game Fest. This year, that will take place from June 21 through… [+852 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Valorant’s new map Pearl takes place in an underwater city, will release with Episode 5
articles.description: Riot Games announced Valorant’s new map, Pearl, which will arrive with the game’s new Act in June. The map takes place in an underwater city.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Overwatch 2’s new Junker Queen animated short reveals her origin story
articles.description: Blizzard released a new Overwatch animated short, “The Wastelander,” all about Junker Queen, the game’s new hero. It’s an extended look at Overwatch 2’s expanded lore and the origins of the 34th hero coming to Blizzard’s free-to-play shooter.
articles.content: Blizzards first new Overwatch cinematic in more than 3 years

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Overwatch 2 drops loot boxes for battle pass, seasonal free-to-play model
articles.description: Blizzard detailed Overwatch 2’s new seasonal model, battle pass, and free-to-play monetization in a livestream, revealing new Mythic-tier skins, a roadmap for new heroes and other content, and a release window for PvE modes.
articles.content: New seasons will add heroes, maps, and cosmetics

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Apex Legends Awakening Collection Event brings back Control mode
articles.description: Apex Legends’ next Collection Event, Awakening, offers another 24 limited-time cosmetics for players to unlock, brings Control mode back, and puts Lifeline’s Clinic on Olympus in the latest Town Takeover.
articles.content: Apex Legendslatest limited-time event will bring back Control, the popular 9v9 game type that was introduced with season 12 back in February. Controls return is one highlight in the Awakening Collect… [+1417 chars]
